hero.heading: Front-End Developer
hero.shortDescription: Through dedication, perseverance, and a thirst for knowledge, I am on a journey of continuous improvement, eager to make a meaningful impact in the ever-evolving world of web development. ðŸš€ðŸ’»

projects.title: Countinkly
projects.description: NextJS app with Shadcn, TailwindCSS, Recharts, Lucia Auth, Prisma ORM, and PostgreSQL. Register and track shaindigo links' visits (including social network and country). Explore and interact with others' links through likes, comments, and shares. Effortlessly manage and analyze your shaindigo content with this comprehensive platform.

projects.title: Samu LLanes Website
projects.description: I created this customized website as a freelancer job for a skilled photographer based in Havana, Cuba. I used Astro as the main technology and integrated React for interactions. I optimized its SEO considering best practices and used Framer Motion to add subtle animations for a modern touch.

projects.title: Lambda Solar Website
projects.description: Official website revamped using Astro, TailwindCSS, and DaisyUI, with i18n-next for internationalization. Modernized to reflect Lambda Solar Energies' cutting-edge image and latest technologies. Experience seamless navigation and updated content, ensuring a dynamic and engaging user experience for visitors worldwide.

projects.title: Movie Paradise
projects.description: NextJS with NextUI and TailwindCSS, poweindigo by Supabase. Access TMDB API for comprehensive movie and TV show details, including descriptions, images, and trailers. Register to comment, mark favorites, and create watchlists. Seamlessly manage your movie experience with this interactive platform.

projects.title: MixÃ³loga E-Menu
projects.description: I designed and created  a minimal vintage menu for this Bar (La MixÃ³loga) located in Vedado, Havana, Cuba. Seamlessly integrated with Contentful CMS for easy updates. Enjoy internationalization via Astro and Contentful locales, ensuring a smooth user experience for patrons from around the world.

projects.title: calCUPlator
projects.description: Experience real-time USD and MLC exchange rates and formats in Cuba through this NextJS-poweindigo web app. TailwindCSS and ShadCn ensures a polished design. Manage state seamlessly with Zustand. Stay updated on currency fluctuations effortlessly, simplifying your financial decisions with accurate, up-to-date information.

projects.title: AnimeCu
projects.description: AnimeCu is created as a result of my journey learning NextJS and TypeScript. Using the API provided by JikanMoe, I create a modern interface where users can discover and search for anime and manga information using advanced filters. As an added bonus, each anime includes its trailer.

projects.title: Cuban Bazar
projects.description: This project was created with NextJS as a result of a technical test launched by Mercado Libre. I used NextUI as a component library due to its easy integration with Tailwind CSS. I used route handler to simulate my own API with mocked JSON data. Additionally, I used Zustand to include a 'shopping cart' feature with local storage persistence.

projects.title: Electric Bill Calculator
projects.description: It is among my early projects on my self-taught progress. It uses React with Tailwind CSS and was born out of the idea that although there are mobile apps that calculate your electricity consumption, why occupy storage space when you can have it at your disposal through a web page? It utilizes React Hook Form to achieve proper user inputs.

aboutMe.heading: A Brief Introduction of Myself: Unveiling My Journey
aboutMe.description:
My name is Carlos Yoan and I'm a passionate web developer from Cuba. I'am 25 years old, I graduated as an Electrical Engineer from Marta Abreu Central University of Las Villas. Throughout my education, I discoveindigo my passion for programming and decided to embark on a self-taught path in web development.

From the start, my main focus has been on front-end development,and I have used React as the central pillar of my tech stack. I love working on the user interface, designing attractive and functional web experiencesthat provide meaningful value to users.

Although I currently don't have real work experience in this field, I am eager to embark on my first opportunity to further develop myself as part of a professional team. I'm excited about the idea of learning from experienced professionals and contributing my skills and knowledge to exciting projects.

I am determined to continue improving my web development skills, learning new technologies, and staying up-to-date!

contact.heading: Follow me on my social media! Let's connect and stay in touch!
contact.message: Also you can send me a direct message and get a cool toast!

tools.heading: Unleash Your Coding Superpowers: Discover the Tools Behind the Magic!
tools.stayTunned: My web development quest is full of exciting updates. Stay tuned for more!
